title: Punches Thrown
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss the Mets possibly holding DeGrom until he is needed, Draymond Green throwing a punch at Jordan Poole during practice and Steve Young joins the show for Five Good Minutes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Draymond green threw a punch and will the Mets wait to play DeGrom?
